Author: Lunar_Heart
Text: It could *literally* kill you. No hyperbole. You have to drink a toxic amount to induce vomiting, and then there's no guarantee you'll get enough upS It will mess you up. I'm begging you not to resort to drinking poison to purge. You're life is worth so much more than that.
